title: 1985년 Crawford 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Crawford. 판결일: 1985-06-04. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Terrance Crawford
**판결일**: 1985-06-04
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 112 A.D.2d 49

## 판결문 요약


Judgment unanimously affirmed. Counsel’s application to withdraw granted (see, People v Crawford, 71 AD2d 38). (Appeal from judgment of Monroe County Court, Mark, J. — burglary, third degree.) Present — Dillon, P.J., Callahan, Boomer, Green and Schnepp, JJ.
...

sources.name: Harvard Law - Case Law Access Project
